segments.text: The girl’s expression is full of anticipation, her hand reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she has no idea how precarious this whole situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like watching a slow-motion disaster unfold; every moment feels tense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman hasn’t turned around yet; it’s almost absurd.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if the boy falls? What if he hits his head?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is filled with domestic bliss, yet there’s an undercurrent of danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sometimes, I wonder if these moments are what childhood is all about—risk and reward.
segments.speaker: PAR
